short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms browser's new tab page with a breathtaking sunrise over snow-capped mountains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The glowing sun slowly rising behind majestic peaks, with layers of mist blanketing the valleys, creates an awe-inspiring view. This extension not only provides a visual escape but also enhances productivity with a customizable search bar, real-time clock, and quick access to your favorite websites via shortcuts. The minimalist and elegant interface complements the serene background, offering a refreshing and focused browsing experience.
